Hi Elizabeth, 

Thanks, we have completed the requested updates. You can review them here: https://stg-oceanunderwriting-staging.kinsta.cloud/liability/

Please note that the layout of the 3 forms was retained in a 3x wide format, rather than a row of 1x and another row of 2x. 

Please review and let us know of any further changes.

@chris Sure, all good on this one. I just need help with the icons. Can we just select which one to use?

+15mins Thanks!

@joel, can you please help with this ticket?

I have added the content to: https://stg-oceanunderwriting-staging.kinsta.cloud/liability/

I need assistance with the page layout/button arrangement. An example of the layout is found in the attached "EIL Copy.docx" file.

PW: vrZjY1E*u497U4Ml

Hi Chris Just coming back to the EIL link - we are ready to send this live with the following assets/updates:
  • Attached please find the copy to be viewed when a user clicks on the EIL button here: Liability - Ocean Underwriting (kinsta.cloud)
  • 3 x application forms for users to download and complete
  • Can we rename the button here to "Find out more"
  • Reminder all the Ocean iconography including lottie files can be found here: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/e3tvn252q5wsfe9/AABxt9e6EPaVpYSSZyxWEhF5a?dl=0
Let me know if you need anything more from me to get this going? Thanks! Elizabeth Pace Marketing and Communications Manager Ocean Underwriting Pty Ltd +61 9186 6096 | + 61 452 067 587 elizabeth.pace@oceanunderwriting.com.au www.oceanunderwriting.com.au Level 6, 60-62 Clarence Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000
